title: M1 Abrams
description: The first tank used by the Germans in World War II, it was lightly armored and armed with two machine guns1.

title: M4 Sherman
description: A light tank that was used in the early stages of the war, it was armed with a 20mm cannon and two machine guns.

title: M60 Patton
description: A medium tank that was introduced in 1943, it was armed with a high-velocity 75mm gun and had sloped armor.

title: M48 Patton
description: A heavy tank that was introduced in 1942, it was armed with an 88mm gun and had thick armor.

title: M3 Lee
description: A heavy tank that was introduced in 1944, it was armed with an 88mm gun and had even thicker armor than the Tiger I.

title: M26 Pershing
description: A tank destroyer that was introduced in 1944, it was based on the Panther tank and was armed with a high-velocity 88mm gun.
